description:
Tronipay describes itself as a FinTech company that provides online payment solutions, Tronipay is located in Brazil and claims to have integrated local payment solutions through one API, which reportedly facilitates collection and settlement for international merchants. The TRP coin is envisaged as a payment solution for mechants to accept payments faster and a secure way.

name: Tronipay
